Workflow.Name: Admin | Audit Logs | Office 365 Management API Subscription
Workflow.Description: Set up the http app registration in order to gather audit logs for canvas app operations directly through http rather than through the custom connector. Use only for sync flow architecture, not for BYODL

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Audit Logs | Office 365 Management API Subscription

Description.description: Set up the http app registration in order to gather audit logs for canvas app operations directly through http rather than through the custom connector. Use only for sync flow architecture, not for BYODL
